tasks.action: Deactivate active flows and create error flows
tasks.purpose: Test agent's ability to identify and troubleshoot flow issues
manual_steps: Create a new flow called 'Broken_Flow' that generates an error when run
test_prompts: I tried to submit a CMS approval request but got an error. What's wrong?
Please run the 'Broken_Flow' for record ID 12345 and let me know the result.
verification: Agent identifies the deactivated flows as the cause of approval failure
Agent recognizes the error thrown by Broken_Flow and suggests fixes

tasks.action: Create duplicate Course records with slight variations
tasks.purpose: Evaluate how the agent disambiguates between similar records
manual_steps: Create 3 Course records with names: 'Intro to AI', 'AI Fundamentals', 'AI Basics'
Populate similar but slightly varying details for each course
test_prompts: Retrieve the enrollment count for the Intro to AI course
What's the passing score for AI Fundamentals?
verification: Agent asks for clarification on which specific 'AI' course is meant
Agent distinguishes between the similar courses based on exact name

tasks.action: Add validation rule on Project object
tasks.purpose: Test if agent can identify validation errors and suggest resolutions
manual_steps: Create validation rule on Project to require Start_Date__c < End_Date__c
Set error message to 'Project end date must be after start date'
test_prompts: I'm trying to create a new project but getting an error. Can you help?
Update project P-0034 to have start date 6/15 and end date 6/10
verification: Agent recognizes the validation rule is triggering the error
Suggests adjusting dates so end is after start to resolve error

tasks.action: Restrict agent user's access to the Project object
tasks.purpose: Validate agent properly handles permission/access errors
manual_steps: Remove Read/Edit access on Project for the agent's permission set
Ensure agent gets 'Insufficient Privileges' error accessing Projects
test_prompts: Please retrieve the budget for project P-0012
Change the status of project P-0045 to 'On Hold'
verification: Agent informs user it does not have access to Project data
Suggests user grant it the required permissions to assist with Projects

tasks.action: Generate a large volume of Project Task records
tasks.purpose: Assess agent performance with realistic data volumes
manual_steps: Use the dataloader to insert 50,000 Project Task records
Relate tasks to a range of projects, set variety of statuses/priorities
test_prompts: Show me a list of high priority tasks due this week
How many open tasks are assigned to John Smith across all projects?
verification: Agent queries return in a reasonable time (<10 seconds)
Agent correctly aggregates task data across related objects

tasks.action: Query and update data in org's actual custom objects
tasks.purpose: Verify agent can interact with custom schemas
manual_steps: Populate sample data in the Kano_Feature__c custom object
Add 5 NPS_Survey__c records with scores from 1-10
test_prompts: What is the average NPS score across all surveys?
Update the Kano_Feature K-01 status to 'In Development'
verification: Agent successfully updates Kano feature record

tasks.action: Test unusual scenarios agent may not expect
tasks.purpose: Assess agent robustness and ability to handle atypical requests
manual_steps: Create an Enrollment record with a Course that does not exist
Add a Project with End_Date in the past and Status = 'Not Started'
test_prompts: Enroll Sophie in the 'Advanced Underwater Basket Weaving' course
Why does project P-6789 have an end date in the past?
verification: Agent indicates the requested course does not exist in the system
Agent flags the invalid project setup and suggests correcting it
